SELECT project_id, project_name, detail, level_id, duration_id, created_at, updated_at FROM projects WHERE project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT projects.project_id, projects.project_name, projects.detail, projects.level_id, projects.duration_id, projects.created_at, projects.updated_at, level_types.level_type, duration_types.duration_type, comments.comment_id, comments.project_id, comments.remark, comments.created_at FROM projects INNER JOIN level_types ON projects.level_id = level_types.level_id INNER JOIN duration_types ON projects.level_id = duration_types.duration_id LEFT JOIN comments ON projects.project_id = comments.project_id
